# Features #
  * User class support by parsing XML files generated by Doxygen
  * Display brief descriptions from Doxygen for classes, variables and functions
  * Document classes in c++ style comment and import with `require()`
  * Variable type deducing by static code analysis.
  * Completely independent from execution environment.

![https://intellua.googlecode.com/hg/example.png](https://intellua.googlecode.com/hg/example.png)

# Notes #
Intellua started as a toy project written without proper knowledge in lexers and c#. Older codes are messy, smells, and inefficient, handle with care.

Intellua is based on [scintilla](http://www.scintilla.org/) and [scintillaNET](https://scintillanet.codeplex.com/)
